programme.title: DENVER THE LAST DINOSAUR
programme.desc: Following Jeremy to his job at the supermarket, Denver hides in the storeroom and stuffs himself full of potato chips. Meanwhile, Casey heads from the La Brea Tar Pits with Wally's dog, Rocky, to look for another dinosaur. Sitting on the remains of Denver's tar shell, she and Rocky drift back in time to a prehistoric jungle

programme.title: DENVER THE LAST DINOSAUR 3
programme.desc: Wally borrows his sister Heather's video camera and the starry-eyed kids set out to make a video--starring themselves. As they squabble over leading roles, Denver wanders off with the camera and inadvertently tapes an auto theft ring stealing a truck. While looking for Denver, Wally is captured by the unscrupulous thieves. But Denver alerts the boys, who rescue Wally and catch the thieves.

programme.title: TED Talk
programme.sub-title: The trauma of systematic racism is killing Black women. A first step toward change
programme.desc: T. Morgan Dixon and Vanessa Garrison, founders of the health nonprofit GirlTrek, are on a mission to reduce the leading causes of preventable death among Black women -- and build communities in the process. How? By getting one million women and girls to prioritize their self-care, lacing up their shoes and walking in the direction of their healthiest, most fulfilled lives.

programme.title: Dr. Myles Munroe
programme.sub-title: Entering and Experiencing Kingdom Citizenship Part 1
programme.desc: This teaching is from the series entitled Kingdom First - Rediscovering God’s Priority Volume 4

programme.title: Heartbeat Episode 17
programme.desc: Rüzgar goes to Bosnia after losing the woman he loves in a car crash two years ago, to run away from everything and everyone but mostly his memories.. He doesn’t make contact with anyone for two years, including his family. His uncle Kemaç and his mother Vahide who is the owner of a major corporation in Turkey, find Ruzgar after long efforts. So Kemal goes to Bosnia to bring Rüzgar back. But Rüzgar is still heartbroken. He can’t live like this so he runs away after a family dinner without telling anyone. He finds himself in Foça after meeting with a taxi driver. Meanwhile Zeynep is about to marry her childhood love Kutay. There’s only a week until the wedding, while the preparations continue Zeynep learns that she was cheated on. She goes to Foça to her most dear grandpa Muammer and aunt Ayla. However, she faints just before she could get there, right in front of Rüzgar’s house. She hides her true identity from everyone except Rüzgar. Afterwards, Zeynep is forced to see Kutay as her best friend Hande is getting married. Sibel, Başak and Hande think up a plan. But they need Rüzgar to make this plan work. Rüzgar can’t say no to this after hearing what happened to Zeynep. So a game of hearts begins between Zeynep and Rüzgar.

programme.desc: Learn how to resist peer pressure from Foi Wambui.mp4

Shamba Shape Up Series 1
programme.sub-title: Shamba Shape Up Series 1 - Ep 3: Tomatoes, Cow Care, Chickens
programme.desc: Meet Jeremiah Who inherited his grandfather's farm with all its problems. Jeremiah learns how to manage his tomatoes, dairy & poultry.

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.sub-title: Someday Your Prince Will Be in Effect: Part 2
programme.desc: Will and Carlton both try to win Melinda over by making up stories about themselves. She ultimately chooses Carlton over Will, though she hides a secret.

programme.title: Sarafina!
programme.desc: As tensions of apartheid spread across South Africa, many students revolts to massive stone throw, a demonstration that comes in a wake of the introduction of Afrikaans language as a means of teaching. This sparks riots among school age young people who have resolved to do what it takes for freedom to come tomorrow. In a township of Soweto, a group of students, led by a beautiful and intelligent young girl, Sarafina, mastermind a plot to rise against the apartheid regime by vehemently rejecting the proposal to have Afrikaans as a medium of instruction. This angers the white people and results in a massive unrest of the students and those others supporting them. Meanwhile, Sarafina's mother accepts a job of a housekeeper in a white household and it angers Sarafina. Following the unrest of students and their possible torture and trial, Sarafina is released from prison, reunites with some of the colleagues and composes a "Freedom is Coming Tomorrow" song

programme.title: DENVER THE LAST DINOSAUR
programme.desc: Following Jeremy to his job at the supermarket, Denver hides in the storeroom and stuffs himself full of potato chips. Morgan Dixon and Vanessa Garrison, founders of the health nonprofit GirlTrek, are on a mission to reduce the leading causes of preventable death among Black women -- and build communities in the process. How? By getting one million women and girls to prioritize their self-care, lacing up their shoes and walking in the direction of their healthiest, most fulfilled lives.

programme.title: Barney
programme.desc: Stella the Storyteller comes in to show Barney and the kids a surprise and brings a special clock to know when it's time to show it. However, she finds that most of the numbers are missing, leaving only the 4 and the 5. So Barney and his friends must find the rest of the numbers. Their search takes them to the library, where they read classic stories and learn about counting, working together and sharing with others.

programme.title: Paternity Court
programme.sub-title: Best Friend Betrayal and Paternity Doubts
programme.desc: 1. Dayman v. Osborne - Her best friend texted her boyfriend that he’s not the father and now a Michigan woman is in court to prove paternity and save her relationship.

programme.title: TED Talk
programme.sub-title: The trauma of systematic racism is killing Black women. A first step toward change
programme.desc: T. Morgan Dixon and Vanessa Garrison, founders of the health nonprofit GirlTrek, are on a mission to reduce the leading causes of preventable death among Black women -- and build communities in the process. How? By getting one million women and girls to prioritize their self-care, lacing up their shoes and walking in the direction of their healthiest, most fulfilled lives.

programme.desc: Ahead of Brinnette's wedding, Christall takes the other housewives on a mini shopping spree. Meanwhile, Olwethu's relationship with Brinnette takes a turn for the worse.

programme.title: Africa Cup of Nations : Group C: Senegal v Cameroon ᴸᶦᵛᵉ
Africa Cup of Nations : Group C: Senegal v Cameroon ᴸᶦᵛᵉ
House of Lords
programme.desc: Lord Boateng

programme.title: Heartbeat Episode 18 (Series)
programme.desc: Rüzgar goes to Bosnia after losing the woman he loves in a car crash two years ago, to run away from everything and everyone but mostly his memories.. He doesn’t make contact with anyone for two years, including his family. His uncle Kemaç and his mother Vahide who is the owner of a major corporation in Turkey, find Ruzgar after long efforts. So Kemal goes to Bosnia to bring Rüzgar back. But Rüzgar is still heartbroken. He can’t live like this so he runs away after a family dinner without telling anyone. He finds himself in Foça after meeting with a taxi driver. Meanwhile Zeynep is about to marry her childhood love Kutay. There’s only a week until the wedding, while the preparations continue Zeynep learns that she was cheated on. She goes to Foça to her most dear grandpa Muammer and aunt Ayla. However, she faints just before she could get there, right in front of Rüzgar’s house. She hides her true identity from everyone except Rüzgar. Afterwards, Zeynep is forced to see Kutay as her best friend Hande is getting married. Sibel, Başak and Hande think up a plan. But they need Rüzgar to make this plan work. Rüzgar can’t say no to this after hearing what happened to Zeynep. So a game of hearts begins between Zeynep and Rüzgar.

programme.title: SISTA SHOW Episode 5
programme.desc: Learn how to resist peer pressure from Foi Wambui.mp4

programme.title: Ben-Hur
programme.desc: Judah Ben-Hur, a Jewish prince falsely accused of treason by his adopted brother, an officer in the Roman army, returns to his homeland after years at sea to seek revenge, but finds redemption.

programme.title: After Earth(Movie)
programme.desc: A crash landing leaves Kitai Raige and his father Cypher stranded on Earth, a millennium after events forced humanity's escape. With Cypher injured, Kitai must embark on a perilous journey to signal for help.

programme.title: Deliver Us from Eva
programme.desc: Eva Dandridge is a very uptight young woman who constantly meddles in the affairs of her sisters and their husbands. Her in-laws, who are tired of Eva interfering in their lives, decide to set her up with someone so she can leave them alone. They end up paying Ray, the local "playboy," $5,000 to date her. The plan goes by smoothly, but troubles comes when Ray actually falls in love with Eva.

programme.title: TED Talk
programme.sub-title: TED Talk - How Africa can use its traditional knowledge to make progress Chika Ezeanya-Esiobu
programme.desc: Chika Ezeanya-Esiobu wants to see Africans unleash their suppressed creative and innovative energies by acknowledging the significance of their indigenous, authentic knowledge. In this powerful talk, she shares examples of untapped, traditional African knowledge in agriculture and policy-making, calling on Africans to make progress by validating and dignifying their reality.

programme.title: Demolition Man
programme.desc: Frozen in 1996, Simon Phoenix, a convicted crime lord, is revived for a parole hearing well into the 21st century. Revived into a society free from crime, Phoenix resumes his murderous rampage, and no one can stop him. John Spartan, the police officer who captured Phoenix in 1996, has also been cryogenically frozen, this time for a crime he did not commit. In 2032, the former cities of Los Angeles, San Diego and Santa Barbara have merged into peaceful, utopian San Angeles. Unable to stop him with their non-violent solutions, the police release Spartan to help recapture Phoenix. Now after 36 years, Spartan has to adapt himself to the future society he has no knowledge about.

programme.title: A CRAZY LOVE STORY
programme.desc: A CRAZY LOVE STORY

programme.title: The Real Housewives of Johannesburg
programme.desc: Naledi invites the ladies to an unbearable yoga class. While Vegan celebrations are underway, Mercy confronts Lerika about her dodgy friendship with Naledi.

programme.title: The Real Housewives of Johannesburg: Season 1, Episode 6
programme.desc: The ladies take a trip to Soweto, Mercy surprises her mother, and nothing goes right at the fashion show.

programme.title: The Real Housewives of Johannesburg: Season 1, Episode 7
programme.desc: The ladies go away for the weekend where Lendy gets a makeover and Christall turns over a new leaf; Evodia shares a shocking announcement at the high tea.

programme.title: The Real Housewives of Johannesburg
programme.desc: Brinnette's friends decide to throw her a surprise bridal shower, but Madam's dress becomes the centre of attention.

programme.title: The Real Housewives of Johannesburg: Season 1, Episode 9
programme.desc: Ahead of Brinnette's wedding, Christall takes the other housewives on a mini shopping spree. Meanwhile, Olwethu's relationship with Brinnette takes a turn for the worse.

programme.title: House of Lords
programme.desc: Lord Grantchester (Labour)

programme.title: Monster Hunter
programme.desc: Captain Artemis and her group of soldiers are pulled into a world where dangerous monsters and humans co-exist. Grappled by danger, they must find a way to escape with help from a mysterious hunter.

programme.title: TED Talk
TED Talk
programme.desc: What if we took out more greenhouse gases than we put into the atmosphere? This hypothetical scenario, known as "drawdown," is our only hope of averting climate disaster, says strategist Chad Frischmann. In a forward-thinking talk, he shares solutions to climate change that exist today -- conventional tactics like the use of renewable energy and better land management as well as some lesser-known approaches, like changes to food production, better family planning and the education of girls. Learn more about how we can reverse global warming and create a world where regeneration, not destruction, is the rule.

What if we took out more greenhouse gases than we put into the atmosphere? In a forward-thinking talk, he shares solutions to climate change that exist today -- conventional tactics like the use of renewable energy and better land management as well as some lesser-known approaches, like changes to food production, better family planning and the education of girls. Learn more about how we can reverse global warming and create a world where regeneration, not destruction, is the rule.

programme.title: Heartbeat Episode 17
programme.desc: Rüzgar goes to Bosnia after losing the woman he loves in a car crash two years ago, to run away from everything and everyone but mostly his memories.. He doesn’t make contact with anyone for two years, including his family. His uncle Kemaç and his mother Vahide who is the owner of a major corporation in Turkey, find Ruzgar after long efforts. So Kemal goes to Bosnia to bring Rüzgar back. But Rüzgar is still heartbroken. He can’t live like this so he runs away after a family dinner without telling anyone. He finds himself in Foça after meeting with a taxi driver. Meanwhile Zeynep is about to marry her childhood love Kutay. There’s only a week until the wedding, while the preparations continue Zeynep learns that she was cheated on. She goes to Foça to her most dear grandpa Muammer and aunt Ayla. However, she faints just before she could get there, right in front of Rüzgar’s house. She hides her true identity from everyone except Rüzgar. Afterwards, Zeynep is forced to see Kutay as her best friend Hande is getting married. Sibel, Başak and Hande think up a plan. But they need Rüzgar to make this plan work. Rüzgar can’t say no to this after hearing what happened to Zeynep. So a game of hearts begins between Zeynep and Rüzgar.

programme.title: Heartbeat Episode 18 (Series)
programme.desc: Rüzgar goes to Bosnia after losing the woman he loves in a car crash two years ago, to run away from everything and everyone but mostly his memories.. He doesn’t make contact with anyone for two years, including his family. His uncle Kemaç and his mother Vahide who is the owner of a major corporation in Turkey, find Ruzgar after long efforts. So Kemal goes to Bosnia to bring Rüzgar back. But Rüzgar is still heartbroken. He can’t live like this so he runs away after a family dinner without telling anyone. He finds himself in Foça after meeting with a taxi driver. Meanwhile Zeynep is about to marry her childhood love Kutay. There’s only a week until the wedding, while the preparations continue Zeynep learns that she was cheated on. She goes to Foça to her most dear grandpa Muammer and aunt Ayla. However, she faints just before she could get there, right in front of Rüzgar’s house. She hides her true identity from everyone except Rüzgar. Afterwards, Zeynep is forced to see Kutay as her best friend Hande is getting married. Sibel, Başak and Hande think up a plan. But they need Rüzgar to make this plan work. Rüzgar can’t say no to this after hearing what happened to Zeynep. So a game of hearts begins between Zeynep and Rüzgar.

programme.title: TED Talk
TED Talk
programme.sub-title: To solve the world's biggest problems, invest in women and girls
To solve the world's biggest problems, invest in women and girls
programme.desc: As CEO of the Global Fund for Women, Musimbi Kanyoro works to support women and their ideas so they can expand and grow. She introduces us to the Maragoli concept of "isirika" -- a pragmatic way of life that embraces the mutual responsibility to care for one another -- something she sees women practicing all over the world. And she calls for those who have more to give more to people working to improve their communities. "Imagine what it would look like if you embraced isirika and made it your default," Kanyoro says. "What could we achieve for each other? For humanity?" Let's find out -- together.

As CEO of the Global Fund for Women, Musimbi Kanyoro works to support women and their ideas so they can expand and grow. She introduces us to the Maragoli concept of "isirika" -- a pragmatic way of life that embraces the mutual responsibility to care for one another -- something she sees women practicing all over the world. And she calls for those who have more to give more to people working to improve their communities. "Imagine what it would look like if you embraced isirika and made it your default," Kanyoro says. "What could we achieve for each other? For humanity?" Let's find out -- together.

programme.title: Ego Episode 2
programme.desc: Ego Episode 2

programme.title: God's Not Dead
programme.desc: After he refuses to disavow his faith, a devout Christian student (Shane Harper) must prove the existence of God or else his college philosophy professor (Kevin Sorbo) will fail him.

programme.title: Superbook - Jacob And Esau
programme.desc: In the Quantum yard, during a spirited water fight, Joy accidentally gets Gizmo's inner workings wet and he fritzes out, suddenly believing he belongs to Joy. Chris can't seem to correct the problem and is furious with Joy, saying he'll never forgive her. SUPERBOOK intercedes and whisks the kids back to the days of Jacob and Esau. The two brothers compete over many things, but when Esau gives up his birthright and Jacob tricks his father out of a blessing they become estranged for many years thereafter. Chris and Joy witness the animosity between the two brothers and the separation it has caused them for years. Chris begins to think about his own unforgiving attitude with Joy. When Jacob finally goes to Esau and his brother finds it in his heart to forgive Jacob, Chris takes the cue and forgives Joy as well and the two are best friends once again. And they work together to repair Gizmo's still-comical malfunctioning microchip.

programme.title: Superbook
programme.sub-title: S1.E4 ∙ Exodus: Let My People Go
programme.desc: On a lazy afternoon, Chris Joy and Gizmo are hanging out in the lab recalling the great adventures they've had with Superbook. This prompts Gizmo to question whether they've yet experienced THE GREATEST Bible story of all time. In answer to his question, Superbook whisks the kids away to meet Moses as he is chosen by God to free the Israelites from their bondage in Egypt. During the course of the adventure, our young heroes make it through the plagues, the Exodus from Egypt, and ultimately to the parting of the Red Sea. When the kids return home, they know they have seen God's awesome power at work and believe it must be the greatest bible story ever. At first they are a bit disheartened, believing that if that was the best, most important bible story of all time, then what have they got left to look forward to? However, they quickly perk up when they realize there are hundreds more stories to visit and each one will have it's own unique appeal and adventure.

programme.title: Kids Health
programme.desc: How Your Muscles Work

programme.title: Some Mothers Do 'Ave 'Em: Season 1, Episode 2
programme.desc: Frank and Betty spend a weekend with her brother George Fisher, who is about to show off his gadget-filled `fool-proof' home, but George soon comes to regret having them over.

programme.title: APOCS January 5 2024
programme.sub-title: Tribute to Nera 10 and All APOCS
programme.desc: APOCS January 5 2024

programme.title: Demolition Man
programme.desc: Frozen in 1996, Simon Phoenix, a convicted crime lord, is revived for a parole hearing well into the 21st century. Revived into a society free from crime, Phoenix resumes his murderous rampage, and no one can stop him. John Spartan, the police officer who captured Phoenix in 1996, has also been cryogenically frozen, this time for a crime he did not commit. In 2032, the former cities of Los Angeles, San Diego and Santa Barbara have merged into peaceful, utopian San Angeles. Unable to stop him with their non-violent solutions, the police release Spartan to help recapture Phoenix. Now after 36 years, Spartan has to adapt himself to the future society he has no knowledge about.

programme.title: Monster Hunter
programme.desc: Captain Artemis and her group of soldiers are pulled into a world where dangerous monsters and humans co-exist. Grappled by danger, they must find a way to escape with help from a mysterious hunter.

programme.title: TED Talk
TED Talk
programme.desc: What if we took out more greenhouse gases than we put into the atmosphere? This hypothetical scenario, known as "drawdown," is our only hope of averting climate disaster, says strategist Chad Frischmann. In a forward-thinking talk, he shares solutions to climate change that exist today -- conventional tactics like the use of renewable energy and better land management as well as some lesser-known approaches, like changes to food production, better family planning and the education of girls. Learn more about how we can reverse global warming and create a world where regeneration, not destruction, is the rule.
